attributes.action: Cancel accommodation university rent because of Covid-19 matter
attributes.additional_details: I don’t find it fair for us to still have to pay the rent for the accommodation as we don’t live in there anymore. Furthermore most of us are not able to work anymore as our jobs don’t need us because of the Covid-19 problem, in order to pay off the last instalment.
attributes.background: Many university students have moved back home on the 17th March because face-to-face teaching stops.
